title: MYELEC
description: Your Electrical Partner in the Luxury World. Electrical installation and renovation work.
companyDescription: MyElec is a Monegasque company specializing in general electrical works for individuals (luxury villas and apartments) and professionals (hospitals, shops, offices, housing). We operate in the Monegasque territory and the Alpes Maritimes for private and public markets. With over 10 years of professional experience in a leading electricity market group, MyElec's leaders have been able to offer exceptional quality electrical solutions in the luxury sector with projects ranging from 2 to 10 million euros in turnover. A committed and passionate journey for a vision of the future and a commitment to environmental sustainability. Combining theory and practice, enthusiasm and dynamism, a combination of know-how allowing us to project towards a humane and sustainable society.
brandsDescription: In the demanding field of electricity, the quality of equipment is crucial to ensure safe and effective installations. Our commitment to excellence is reflected in the meticulous choice of reference brands that we use for each project. These strategic partnerships with industry leaders enhance our ability to offer reliable and innovative solutions.
